name: Everything Bagel Chaffle with Smoked Salmon Cream Cheese
author: lutzflcat
summary: Eating low carb, feeling deprived, and missing your bagel? Here's a quick-and-easy solution to get your bagel fix.
ingredients: 4 tablespoons smoked salmon cream cheese spread (such as Philadelphia®)
directions: Preheat a waffle maker according to manufacturer's instructions
Whisk egg, 2 teaspoons bagel  seasoning, coconut flour, and baking powder together in a small bowl
Pour 1/2 of the batter onto the waffle maker and spread it out from the center with a spoon
Close the waffle maker and cook until the chaffle reaches your desired doneness and waffle maker stops steaming, 3 to 4 minutes
Remove chaffle from waffle maker, place on a rack, and repeat process with remaining batter
Cool for several minutes to let them crisp up
Spread each chaffle with 1/2 of the salmon cream cheese and garnish with remaining 1 teaspoon bagel seasoning, capers, and red onion
Cut out a circle in the center of the chaffle with a sharp knife or use a 1 1/2-inch round cookie cutter to make the chaffles look more authentic and fun
